titles.title: I Give My Heart To Thee (familiar easy tune)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I give my heart to Thee O Jesus most desired And heart for heart The gift shall be For Thou my heart Hast fired{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou hearts alone wouldst move Thou only hearts dost love I would love Thee As Thou lov'st me O Jesus most desired{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What off'ring can I make Dear Lord to love like Thine That Thou the Word Didst stoop to take A human form like mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"Give me thy heart My son" Lord Thou my heart hast won I would love Thee As Thou lov'st me O Jesus most desired{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy heart is opened wide Its offered love most free Thy heart to heart I may abide And hide myself in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ah how Thy love doth burn Till I that love return I would love Thee As Thou lov'st me O Jesus most desired{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here finds my heart its rest Repose that knows no shock The strength of love That keeps it blest In Thee the riven Rock{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My soul as girt around Her citadel hath found I would love Thee As Thou lov'st me O Jesus most desired{/lang-eng}
